prompts: Create a legendary steel-type Pokemon with a majestic appearance and strong presence.
Imagine a mythical creature that embodies strength and grace with a majestic horn.
Show me a quadruped Pokemon with a unique blue and gold color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in mountainous habitats and has a protective nature.

Give me a legendary Pokemon that symbolizes courage and is often found in serene environments.
